name: Mine The Beat
description:
• WASD  || Arrow Keys = Move
  • Watch your beat streak! If your streak gets too low you may end up dying! 
Mine The Beat. A Rhythm-Based Mining Game where your goal is to move to the beat, mine ores, avoid enemies and get rich.

A game made by Hunterson Studio (Programming), TKIMUSE (Audio) and GamesBySaul (Art) as part of Ludum Dare 48 where the theme was "Deeper and Deeper".

In this game, it's important to watch the beat as you can only move or perform actions on the beat! Customisation is your friend! In the game, there are a variety of customisation options that you can add to your dwarf! Really make the character your own! And feel free to share your creations with us down below!
Go even deeper in the mine and collect ores! But beware you won't be alone and the deeper you go the tougher it gets! I wonder what you will find at the end of each floor! HuntersonStudio | TKIMUSE | GamesBySaul
